summary: MY 16 YEAR OLD SON WAS DRIVING HIS CAR, 1991 CHEVY LUMINA EURO 3.1, WHEN HE AND HIS 3 PASSENGERS HEARD A LOUD POP.  HE IMMEDIATELY LOST HIS STEERING, THE WHEEL TURNS FREELY NOW.  THE CAR HAD TO BE TOWED HOME, AND IS NOW SITTING IN OUR DRIVEWAY, WITH WHAT LOOKS LIKE THE MOTOR SITTING ON THE DRIVEWAY.
